Ingredients.1: 1 (3 pound) boneless pork loin roast, or more to taste

Ingredients.2: 1 tablespoon barbeque spice rub, or to taste

Ingredients.3: 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbecue sauce, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 225 degrees F (104 degrees C). Place a small rack inside a Dutch oven.

Directions.2: Rub pork roast with barbecue spice rub and place on the rack in the Dutch oven.

Directions.3: Cover and cook in the preheated oven until roast is fork-tender, about 8 hours.

Directions.4: Shred the roast with 2 forks and return meat to the Dutch oven with some of the roasting juices and a generous amount of barbeque sauce.

Directions.5: Place on the stovetop and let simmer over medium heat for at least 30 minutes.
